Mike Nguyen

Tech Lead / Fullstack Dev, Auckland, NZ

About Me

I am an accomplished Technical Lead and Senior Full-Stack Developer with a proven track record of delivering complex software solutions. With over 15 years of experience, I have successfully led multi-million-dollar projects, integrated distributed systems, and provided customized API solutions. My unwavering commitment to high-quality code and expertise in Agile methodologies drive business success.


As a Technical Lead, I excel in guiding cross-functional teams to achieve exceptional results. Drawing on my expertise in web application development, cloud system integration, and complex production environments, I ensure efficient project execution and foster seamless collaboration. With a deep understanding of Agile methodologies and best practices, I drive continuous improvement and deliver successful outcomes.


Currently, I am serving as a Tech lead / Senior Full-Stack Consultant, combining my technical prowess with a passion for innovation. With strong problem-solving skills and a focus on delivering high-quality, functional code, I consistently exceed expectations. My hunger for knowledge and determination make me a valuable asset to organizations in need of a skilled Technical Lead.

Experience

Clearpoint

Chapter Lead / Senior Fullstack Consultant - March 2021 - Now

As a Tech Lead and Senior Full-Stack Developer, I work closely with clients to understand their business needs and provide customized solutions that drive their success.

  • Played a pivotal role in the successful modernization of Xero and Countdown's strategic project, delivering a modern and user-friendly UI to replace the legacy system. The implementation resulted in accelerated fix releases to production, reducing the turnaround time from weeks to a single day.
  • Led a team of 5 professionals in designing and building new microservice applications, bringing Countdown NZ's Everyday Rewards (EDR) vision to fruition. This transformative initiative revolutionized operations, creating efficient and streamlined processes that provided customers with an exceptional experience.
  • Actively managed, coached and mentored 4 engineers, providing guidance and support to facilitate their professional development and successfully promoting them to the next level.
C#, .net core react, typescript azure/aws azure devops, teamcity microservice clean architecture launchdarkly kubernetes

Solnet

Senior Software Consultant - July 2019 - March 2021 (2 years)

As a Senior Full-Stack Developer, my goal is to understand clients' needs and deliver customized technology solutions that drive their success.

  • Designed and implemented the scalable rating & pricing engine and solution that being used by all nib services and replacing the existing legacy system.
  • Actively involved and assisted on agile process and requirement work, that helps to reduce idle & wasting time spending on requirement clarification between developers and product team.
  • Designed and implemented scalable e-commerce solution that provides significant cost reduction for ERP clients in term of operation and maintenance.
.net core react aws azure microservice serverless azure devops tdd

SMBC Bank, Singapore

AVP of Technology Specialist - December 2017 - July 2019 (2 years)

As the AVP of Technology Specialist, I designed and developed a new development framework, mentored software engineers, guided agile practices, and led DevOps transformation to digitize the business workflow process across multiple functions in the bank.

  • Led development of reusable UI components and code generator, achieving an 80% reduction in development time (from one month to one week), enabling rapid prototyping of new business requirements, and promoting consistency and standardization for enhanced visibility and clarity to business users.
  • Designed workflow processes and developed core modules for various new workflow systems
  • Engineered and executed the implementation of DevOps CI/CD for both new and legacy code bases, resulting in a significant reduction in release time from over a month to just a few days.
c#, .net core devops react, typescript solution design microservice continuous integration

MIMS, Singapore

Tech Lead / Integration Architect - December 2011 - Nov 2017 (6 years)

As the Tech Lead and Integration Architect, I designed and implemented various .NET applications, standardized software development processes, led data migration projects, and provided mentorship on software development, quality assurance, process improvement, and agile methodologies.

  • Designed and implemented an alternative key matching API service, ensuring data integrity across all digital products (web, mobile, desktop).
  • Successfully executed data migration projects across 10 Asia Pacific countries, achieving approximately 95% data coverage and enabling the transformation of centralized Content Management and data production processes.
  • Designed data structure using MSSQL database and Domain Driven Design, implementing a C# ASP.NET application for seamless integration of legacy systems into the new e-MIMS Australia system, generating $1 million in revenue.
c#, asp.net mvc mssql api design solution design software architecture ddd tdd

GRC-Systems, Singapore

Software Engineer / Scrum Master - March 2011 - Dec 2011 (~2 years)

As a Software Engineer, I implemented and optimized web-based applications, ensuring high performance and delivering exceptional user experiences. Additionally, I took on the role of Scrum Master, adapting and leading agile practices for cross-functional and culturally diverse teams.

c# wcf asp.net .net core azure silverlight

NCS, Singapore

Application Consultant - May 2008 - Feburary 2010 (1.5 years)

As a Application Consultant, I have been responsible for delivering software solutions across diverse domains, including banking, legal contracts, manufacturing logistics, and retail. My role entails maintaining, coordinating, and developing software artifacts. Additionally, I prepare functional, use-case, and test specifications while troubleshooting and providing solutions for other project teams.
